ygData.subject: RE: Archery
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Crushbone was a great archery range for me...I hung around the throneroom at 16th firing arrows at other fights until I got Archery where I wanted it.
ygData.messageBody:
--- kale usi <kaleusi@...> wrote:
> Was wondering if anyone knows of an archery range
> (in game) or such where one can go and work up your
> archery skills.

Crushbone was a great archery range for me...I hung
around the throneroom at 16th firing arrows at other
fights until I got Archery where I wanted it. Worked
like a charm, took me about 5 hours to take it from 1
to about 70.

===
:D
Dave's World
-No matter where you go, there you are-
"People will believe a lie either because they want to
believe it's true, or because they fear it is." Wizard's
First Rule, Sword of Truth, Terry Goodkind
